Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Don't open your eyes just yet."}
{3: "Sitting on a small sofa in Karenina's secret base and surrounded by all sorts of industrial devices, I hear her open a shelf."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{3: 'Your thoughts drift back to the morning when Karenina appeared around your dorm.'}
{2: 'Hey.', 3: '10', 4: 'Fancy seeing you here.', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey, I totally didn't come looking for you! I came for the Engineering Force..."}
{3: "As soon as our eyes met, Karenina's Inver-Device instantly powers down."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "H-hey, totally didn't see you there just now. Karenina averts your gaze and gives her thigh a light tap.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Guess you're not here for me?", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Of course, I'm here for you! Don't you remember what day it is today?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Should I pretend I don't remember?", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Anyway, four o'clock this afternoon, and you know where you're supposed to go.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryZhengyan.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory780.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryZhengyan.prefab'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Slowly opening my eyes, I see Karenina turn her head away and hand over an album.'}
{3: "She pulls her hand back right when you're about to take it."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'J-just let me go over it again.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says Karenina, looking all nervous.'}
{2: 'Is there something wrong with it?', 3: '28'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "C'mon, Karenina, why are you being so nervous?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She turns around.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'S-screw it! Take it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She shoves the album into your hand.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "This is the album we agreed on. I wasn't quite sure when to give it to you... then came your birthday.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The Engineering Force had a vote and decided to go with this cover! I only gave them the options to choose from...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You look cute on the cover, Karen.', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You're only allowed to say that word once.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A card that looks like a vintage ticket sub falls out when you open the album. When you pick it up and look at Karenina, you see her fingers locked together.'}
{3: 'The ticket stub read, "Handshake Ticket".'}

{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Well... this is just an idea I got from WGAA. They said celebrities from the Golden Age did this a lot with their albums. I had quite a few different versions made, and I picked this one personally.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'So what am I supposed to do with this... handshake ticket?', 3: '41'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'You shake hands, duh.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina sits back on the sofa and slowly extends her hand.'}
{3: 'With it, you hold your hand out, too. Handshakes are common in social settings, but this kind of handshake is rare.'}
{3: "You decide to place your other hand on top of Karenina'sâ€”and as soon as you do that, you feel her hand trembling slightly, presumably because the flow of her vital fluid has changed."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey, hey, hey! This is anything but a handshake!', 4: '1'}
{2: "(Look into Karenina's eyes)"}
{3: 'Despite what she said, you can feel her grip on your hand tightening a bit.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But I'll let that slide since it's your birthday today.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina places her other hand on top as well, her eyes looking for a place to look at.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "One minute. That's what I remember the ticket says...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Well... I don't mind if you want to hold my hands a little longer, though...", 4: '1'}
